English all - words results.from sentence:
English all - words results
GAS and GAS ext achieves the state - of - theart performance on the concatenation of all test datasets .

IMS + emb.on: SE3 , SE13 and SE15 test sets

beat.from sentence: However , our best model can also beat IMS + emb on the SE3 , SE13 and SE15 test sets .

concatenation memory updating strategy.from sentence: . ways performs best on all the test sets 11 , we can find that GAS ext with concatenation memory updating strategy achieves the best results 70.6 on the concatenation of the four test datasets .

our best model.from sentence: Compared with other three neural - based methods in the fourth block , we can find that our best model outperforms the previous best neural network models on every individual test set .

extending.from sentence: Incorporating glosses into neural WSD can greatly improve the performance and extending the original gloss can further boost the results .

Bi - LSTM baseline.from sentence: Compared with the Bi - LSTM baseline which only uses labeled data , our proposed model greatly improves the WSD task by 2.2 % F1 - score with the help of gloss knowledge .

GAS.from sentence: Furthermore , compared with the GAS which only uses original gloss as the background knowledge , GAS ext can further improve the performance with the help of the extended glosses through the semantic relations .
